name: United States Antarctic Program Data Center (USAP-DC)
description: The U.S. Antarctic Program Data Center (USAP-DC) supports investigators funded by the National Science Foundation in documenting, preserving, and disseminating their research results. It provides a central USAP Project Catalog for all projects funded by the NSF Antarctic program and a Data Repository for research datasets derived from these projects. Data include NSF research-related glaciology data. Datasets are registered in the Antarctic Metadata Directory to comply with the Antarctic Treaty and to represent the U.S. in Scientific Committee on Antarctic Research (SCAR) activities.
